App has been updated!

What's new:

Added the notifications when prices change, go to settings to schedule how often you want your phone to get data, and go to price history to view the price graphs. I recommend waiting at least a couple days before enabling notifications, otherwise you'll get spammed with updates as prices change pretty quick. But yeah, get ready to make some serious flipping money, I have literally watched some 1000+ coin items randomly drop to 2 coins for a couple minutes before going back up.

Notifications might be a little wonky, I'll fix it if there's an issue. 

To the two of you who donated money, thanks!
